title: Assign a Claim to an Adjuster
description: A new, complex disability claim has been filed and needs to be assigned to a senior claims adjuster.

tasks.description: Review the new claim to assess its complexity.
tasks.expected_outcome: A claims manager reviews the file and determines it requires an experienced adjuster.

tasks.description: Check the workload and specialty of available senior adjusters.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager reviews the team's current assignments to find an adjuster with capacity.

tasks.description: Assign the claim to the selected adjuster.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully assigns the new claim to the appropriate adjuster's queue.
